title: Criss Angel's son diagnosed with blood cancer
text: Criss Angel's son diagnosed with blood cancer Sunday, 25 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Los Angeles, Oct 25 : Magician Criss Angel had to cancel his Las Vegas shows at the Luxor after finding out that his son Johnny Crisstopher Sarantakos was diagnosed with acute lymphoblastic leukemia. The 47 year old magician flew to Australia to support his young son diagnosed with leukemia.
